item.title: Someting Kubernetes Containers
item.description: 002 Title was not set when I applied for the talk, something about continers Now Containers at Booking Not there yet, it is a thing we are still working on 003 What we do, selling rooms, getting commission from the Hotel A very simple thing, it seems, but very different depending on where in the world you are Very hard to explain what a hotel offers, lots of reviews and images When we fail, somebody is sleeping under a bridge That is why we need to be boring.
